titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Oversight and Reform in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Oversight and Reform in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Reform

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Oversight and Reform for the 117th Congress.
